violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than or equal to 1000.

violations.description: Persons are nearby without proper badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only persons with green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange, or black badges enter the restricted zone.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to exceeding the maximum occupancy limit and unauthorized persons being nearby without proper badges. This poses a high risk of security breaches.
